results.question: How does a non-employee director receive his/her restricted stock unit award or option grant?
gold_answer: on the date of his or her initial appointment to the Board of Directors equal to the pro-rated amount of the annual grant
results.markdown_table_response:
(1) For non-employee directors, the restricted stock unit award or option grant vesting date is determined by the date on which the option or restricted stock unit was granted. This date is determined by the grant date fair value of the option or restricted stock unit, measured in accordance with ASC 718.
